position: IT Security CTO and Presales Consulting
description:
* Consulted and Supported 100+ Greek and Balcan companies on IT security and IT security products (AV, Firewalls, Email Security, etc.)

* Performed more than 50 training on customers on IT security products and practices.

* Lead a team of technical support engineers of 3-4 persons.

Key Achievement: Consulted and Supported 3 out of 4 major banks in Greece in email and IT security, with 5000+ users each.
